content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany. He was interested in renting an apartment I had for rent in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?​ Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price?​ Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 850 euros per month.
name: Evaluator

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator
